Test Name: Nephrocalcinosis, Nephrolithiasis, and Renal Electrolyte Imbalance Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Blood or tissue (for genomic DNA extraction)
Purpose: To detect and interpret genetic variants associated with nephrocalcinosis, nephrolithiasis, and renal electrolyte imbalance.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer (Nanodrop), gel electrophoresis system, capillary electrophoresis/bioanalyzer, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent)
